phrases: When I went to see her the other day, we talked like always.
Let us go shopping for spring clothes...
When Kousei and I got to the hospital...
Kaori-chan's in the ICU right now.
She is going to be okay, right?
We can see her again, right?
But it really does not look too good.
So Kousei knows about this, too?
Kousei's going to break down all over again...
What do you think you are doing?
Do you understand the situation you are in?
You only have so many days before the competition!
Okay, we are going to practice!
Why does it have to end up this way?
All I... all I ever wanted was...
To play the piano, and make my mother get well... that is all...
Why... does it have to end up this way?
They let me come back to my room yesterday.
That was my first time ever inside an ICU.
You just cannot relax in there, you know.
You really caught me at an awkward moment!
That is why I told you not to come to the hospital.
Do not come to see me and then stand around looking so gloomy!
You are going to make me even sicker!
I want to eat it outside!
Come on, come on, come on!
One word about me being heavy, and I will kick your butt, all right?
I think you could stand to eat more.
At some level, I felt easy in my mind.
That she was all right now.
That she was so strong, she could just send her illness packing.
That this now would go on forever.
She loves stuffed animals, and loves sweets.
You are just a normal girl, and yet...
You are feeling sorry for yourself.
The people I care about keep leaving me.
The people I care about... music takes them away from me.
I am going to be left all alone.
I am going to have surgery, see.
I am going to struggle as hard as I can.
Struggle, struggle, struggle, like there is no tomorrow.
It is all your fault, all of it.
The reason I am putting up such an unseemly struggle,
why I am so fixated on living... it is your fault.
You gave me this desire to cling to the time that I spend with you.
Are not you going to struggle, too?
We are so good at struggling!
We risk our lives to struggle, because we are musicians, remember?
I have not touched the piano for a week now.
It was the same when you were my accompanist.
Back then, I was always playing the piano for my part-time job.
No way can I play decently now!
Being able to play in this state would be a miracle.
Miracles can happen just like that!
You exist inside me, Kousei Arima.
You like Moo Moo Brand milk.
What kind of stuff did you collect?
What anime shows did you like?
There is so much that I do not know.
I envy Tsubaki-chan for knowing everything.
I want to know so many things about you.
Do not leave me all alone!
You are so beautiful in the snow.
We are going to start the anesthesia, all right?
We all need someone to kiss us goodbye.
We are going to begin the surgery now.
You could not have played better, Emi!
All I can do is sigh.
Brother gave a great performance, too, but on another level, she did not concede an inch!
So this person is ahead of me on the path I want to follow.
I thought that Takeshi would be the runaway favorite, but there is no way to tell.
Artistic impression's all that separates them now...
You are certainly putting on the finishing touches.
Wonder which one's going to win?
The greatest pianist of all has yet to play, you know.
As always, so adept at fanning the flames of determination, that Ms. Ochiai.
I brought him to the venue, but who knows if he can play decently.
He is reverted to that state from two years ago.
It is not even a matter of how he does in this competition anymore.
He might very well be finished as a pianist, too.
I am at my wits' end...
Want me to get you some medicine?
I can bring you an antacid right away.
Is not he just getting himself focused?
Got To play, got to play, got to play.
Please stand by in the wings.
Your face could not be paler.
Anybody can see that you are not yourself.
Come on, let us go to the infirmary!
Dude's not going to pass out or anything, is he?
I made you remember something you do not want to remember.
A violinist who cannot hold her own bow... that is pointless.
I will not forget, even if I die.
You can just forget about it all, like you have pressed the reset button.
I guess maybe we never should have met, huh?
It sounds so deep, so unhurried.
Chopin's Ballade No. 1 in G Minor, Op. 23.
Like a whisper, like a show of affection, so gently...
The sound of Chopin's Ballade, emanating so sorrowfully.
You were thinking about a girl you like, right?
For now, just play from your heart.
Inside my heart, it is all chaos.
It is not all bad, you know.
You have done nothing but play the piano.
I am not good with words, remember?
The reason I am here right now...
The people who played a part in my life.
The people who made my life fuller.
So everything's got to be expressed in music, right?
Even if we are sad, or a total mess, even if we have hit rock bottom, we have still got to play.
Do you think I can do it?
That is who I am, how I am going to live my life.
I am a musician, after all!
It is taken on all this color!
Kousei's performance is bursting with color.
